resources.string: Tap the screen anywhere to check for updates. The server typically provides new data at 5 minute intervals.
The current value will automatically update when the app is started, and then every 10 minutes while the app is running.
Tap the current-value text (the yellow text) to change the displayed units (the default is usd/√ê).
This app is provided to the community, free of charge and free of ads. If you find it useful, please consider donating a few doge to support future development.
